description:
In the nova.conf file, spaces cannot be added after commas in lists.

In example:
if I writes
enabled_apis    =   ec2,osapi_compute,metadata

then it's OK

but if I writes
enabled_apis    =   ec2,  osapi_compute,  metadata

then it's not OK !
title: Folsom: Spaces are not accepted in nova.conf

comments.content:
In the nova.conf file, spaces cannot be added after commas in lists.

In example:
if I writes
enabled_apis    =   ec2,osapi_compute,metadata

then it's OK

but if I writes
enabled_apis    =   ec2,  osapi_compute,  metadata

then it's not OK !
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~philippe-berthault-deactivatedaccount

comments.content: The current listopt parsing code in openstack-common doesn't split on whitespace following a comma, just the comma.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mikal

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
